Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
SIGMA
A scientific {visual programming} environment from NASA.
{(http://fi-www.arc.nasa.gov/fia/projects/sigma/)}.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sigma \Sig"ma\, n.; pl. {Sigmas}. [L., from Gr. ???, ???.] The Greek letter [Sigma], [sigma], or [sigmat] (English S, or s). It originally had the form of the English C. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: SIGMA Software Industrialized Generator and Maintenance Aids system (MITI)
sigma n : the 18th letter of the Greek alphabet
